mapper.select: select count(*) from member where to_date( input_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') =to_date( sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) from report where to_date( input_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') =to_date( sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) from BUYRECEIPT where to_date(PAYMENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') =to_date( sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select rownum rank,total,name category from(select count(c2.name) total, c2.name from product p , BUYRECEIPT b, category3 c3, category2 c2 where p.pcode = b.pcode and p.c3code= c3.c3code and c3.c2code = c2.c2code and to_date(PAYMENT_DATE,'yy-MM-dd') ='2023-12-08' and cancle is null group by c2.name order by total desc ) where rownum between 1 and 5
select nvl(max(count(*)),0) cnt from member where to_date(login_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_date(sysdate+1,'yyyy-MM-dd') group by login_date
select nvl(max(total_cnt),0) cnt from visitors where to_date(daily_date,'yy-MM-dd') = #{date}
